title: Be kind to one another
guideline: Couchers.org is an inclusive community where people of all cultures and backgrounds come together. Treat everyone with mutual respect and dignity.

title: This is not a dating app
guideline: Couchers.org is NOT for dating or hooking up. Harassment or or using the platform for the purpose of dating or hooking up will result in a ban.

title: Be safe and sensible
guideline: Read profiles, references, and resources. Report any inappropriate content or behavior.

title: Keep money out of it
guideline: Keep things non-transactional. Don't exchange money while staying or hosting. Couchers.org is about learning, experiences, and getting to know people.
